Package io.servicetalk.concurrent

Interface NonBlockingThread

All Known Subinterfaces:
IoThreadFactory.IoThread
public interface NonBlockingThread
Marker interface for Threads that must never be blocked (blocking operations not permitted), like I/O threads.

Blocking operations known to ServiceTalk may throw NonBlockingThread.IllegalBlockingOperationException if they are invoked on a Thread that implements this interface.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static final class 
    NonBlockingThread.IllegalBlockingOperationException
    This exception is thrown when a blocking operation is performed on a NonBlockingThread.
